answers.answer: Nope, never heard of it. I'll have to check that out later.thanks

question: After I discovered this today, I have just bought one.ThePetCheckup is a simple, in-home early detection test that enables you to detect health problems in your dogs and cats — even before symptoms appear.screens for:• Kidney disease• Diabetes Mellitus• Diabetes Insipidus• Kidney infections• Bacterial infections• Urinary Tract Infections• Urinary bladder disease• Auto-immune disease• Cushing’s disease• Prostate diseases• Hepatitis• Liver conditionshttp://www.thepetcheckup.com/The complete kit is $29.95 plus $5 shipping. The British one is £21.99 and the site I bought from it appears shipping is free.Has anyone used this product?
title: The Pet Checkup. Home screening
